statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/spsrInfMg/aT02SpsrAthHisChpSmmPhsDelJob/AT02SpsrAthHisChpSmmPhsDel/retvSpsrAthHisChpSmmNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBAT02 A /* GCB책임자승인내역점검집계 */ WHERE A.영업년월일 < ${작업기준년월일}

DELETE /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/spsrInfMg/aT02SpsrAthHisChpSmmPhsDelJob/AT02SpsrAthHisChpSmmPhsDel/delSpsrAthHisChpSmm */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBAT02 /* GCB책임자승인내역점검집계 */ WHERE 영업년월일 < ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 100
